mapper.insert: insert into auction_schedule( auction_schedule_no, auction_schedule_title, auction_schedule_start_date, auction_schedule_end_date, auction_schedule_state, auction_schedule_notice ) values( #{auctionScheduleNo}, #{auctionScheduleTitle}, #{auctionScheduleStartDate}, #{auctionScheduleEndDate}, #{auctionScheduleState}, #{auctionScheduleNotice} )
mapper.update: update auction_schedule set auction_schedule_title = #{auctionScheduleTitle}, auction_schedule_start_date = #{auctionScheduleStartDate}, auction_schedule_end_date = #{auctionScheduleEndDate}, auction_schedule_state = #{auctionScheduleState}, auction_schedule_notice = #{auctionScheduleNotice} where auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo}
